elements.name: User should add product to shopping cart successfully

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover on Gear menu
I click on Bag menu
I click on Night Duffle Bag
Verify I am navigated to Bag page with "Overnight Duffle" text
I change quantity "3"
I click on add to cart Button
Verify bag added successfully with "You added Overnight Duffle to your shopping cart." message

arguments.val: You added Overnight Duffle to your shopping cart.

steps.name: I click on shopping cart link
Verify product name "Overnight Duffle"
Verify product quantity "3"
Verify product price "$135.00"
I change quantity "5" on shopping page
I click on update cart button
Verify that cart is updated successfully with "$225.00"

name: Gear Product Test
description: As a user I want to add product in shopping cart

elements.name: User should add product successfully to shopping cart

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover on Men menu
I mouse hover on Men Bottom
I click on Pants menu
I sort products by product name
I click on size of Cronos pant
I click on black colour of Cronos pant
I click on Add to cart Button of Cronos pant
Verify product added successfully message with "You added Cronus Yoga Pant to your shopping cart."

arguments.val: You added Cronus Yoga Pant to your shopping cart.

steps.name: I click on Shopping cart link
Verify Shopping cart is displayed with "Shopping Cart"
Verify Product name with "Cronus Yoga Pant"
Verify Pant size with "32"
Verify Colour of pant "Black"

name: Men product test
description: As a User I want to add product in shopping cart

elements.name: Verify that User can sort products by Product Name

steps.name: I am on home page
I mouse hover on Women menu
